name: CreateLoyaltyReward
description:
Create a loyalty reward by locking points for a customer.

This tool creates a loyalty reward by using a specified reward tier ID to lock points. Optionally, it can add the reward and related discount to an existing order if an order ID is provided. After creation, the points are locked and unavailable for redemption.

parameters.name: loyalty_account_id
parameters.description: The Square-assigned ID of the loyalty account to which the reward belongs.

value_schema.description: The Square-assigned ID of the [loyalty account](entity:LoyaltyAccount) to which the reward belongs.

parameters.name: reward_tier_id
parameters.description: The Square-assigned ID of the reward tier used to create the loyalty reward.

value_schema.description: The Square-assigned ID of the [reward tier](entity:LoyaltyProgramRewardTier) used to create the reward.

parameters.name: unique_request_key
parameters.description: A unique string that identifies this CreateLoyaltyReward request. Must be unique for each request to prevent duplication.

value_schema.description:
A unique string that identifies this `CreateLoyaltyReward` request. 
Keys can be any valid string, but must be unique for every request.

parameters.name: loyalty_reward_id
parameters.description: The Square-assigned ID of the loyalty reward to be created or referenced.

value_schema.description: The Square-assigned ID of the loyalty reward.

parameters.name: loyalty_reward_status
parameters.description: The status of the loyalty reward. Possible values: 'ISSUED', 'REDEEMED', 'DELETED'.

value_schema.description: The status of the loyalty reward.

parameters.name: number_of_loyalty_points
parameters.description: The number of loyalty points to use for creating the reward.

value_schema.description: The number of loyalty points used for the reward.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: The Square-assigned ID of the order to which the reward is attached. Optional if no order is involved.

value_schema.description: The Square-assigned ID of the [order](entity:Order) to which the reward is attached.

parameters.name: reward_creation_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp when the reward was created, in RFC 3339 format. This indicates the date and time of reward creation.

value_schema.description: The timestamp when the reward was created, in RFC 3339 format.

parameters.name: reward_last_updated_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp when the reward was last updated, in RFC 3339 format.

value_schema.description: The timestamp when the reward was last updated, in RFC 3339 format.

parameters.name: reward_redeemed_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp when the reward was redeemed, in RFC 3339 format. This value indicates the moment the reward was used.

value_schema.description: The timestamp when the reward was redeemed, in RFC 3339 format.
